constituent: inscription, metal, gold, name, evening, mouth
heisigStory: Take inscription in the sense of the name you ask the jeweler to carve on a gold bracelet or inside a gold ring to identify its owner or communicate some sentimental message. It will help if you can recall the first time you had this done and the feelings you had at the time.
koohiiStory1: A piece of metal with a name on it. Well, this is basically the definition of inscription.
koohiiStory2: I imagine ancient Egyptian inscriptions: Pharaohs´ names written in gold.
myStory: chữ. dấu khắc. tên mạ vàng
